Researchers at the Ivory Tower believe that Kamaloka is the result of another dimension overlapping Aden. The monsters of Kamaloka are tremendously powerful. Adventurers must take care to enter only the Kamaloka appropriate for their level. The following captains can grant access: Captain Bathis (Town of Gludio): levels 23, 26, 29 Captain Lucas (Town of Dion): levels 33, 36, 39 Captain Gosta (Heine): levels 43, 46, 49 Captain Mouen (Town of Oren): levels 53, 56, 59 Captain Vishotsky (Town of Schuttgart): levels 63, 66, 69 Captain Mathias (Town of Rune): levels 73, 78, 81
